person.persName: William C. Grier (Carter County, KY, farmer and provost marshal)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer and provost marshall. Ohio native. Married to Amanda N. Grier. Father of Harriet A. Grier, Ida Grier, Luwilla Grier, Sophia Grier, and Ella Grier. Farmer in Carter County in 1860. Postmaster of Olive Hill from June 5, 1862 to July 8, 1862. Provost marshal in Greenup, Kentucky from March 3,1863 to May 29, 1865. Member of the Freemasons.
